name: The Life of a Dog
description:
"The Life of a Dog" is a short 5-minute experience with a powerful message; aimed at raising awareness of issues we don't always think about.

The game may not be suitable for younger audiences and contains strong language and sensitive imagery that some people may find upsetting.

Use the space bar to cycle through dialogue, click on the arrows with the left mouse button.

Programmed, designed and written by Naila Malik.
